personal_info.name: waheeb edrees
personal_info.current_status: currently pushing the boundaries of artificial intelligence
personal_info.about:
hi there! i'm waheeb edrees, a passionate ai researcher and ai engineer dedicated to advancing the field of artificial intelligence. i specialize in machine learning, deep learning, and ai system design with a focus on creating intelligent solutions that make a real impact.

my work spans across various domains including natural language processing, computer vision, penetration testing automation, and ai safety. i'm constantly exploring new frontiers in ai research and engineering innovative systems that push the boundaries of what's possible.

github: waheebedrees
website: waheebedrees.pythonanywhere.com
location: somewhere in the ai research space
status: always learning, always researching, always building

skills.programming_languages: python, javascript, dart, shell scripting, html/css
skills.ai_ml_frameworks: tensorflow, pytorch, jax, hugging face transformers, scikit-learn, yolov8, opencv, pandas, numpy
skills.specialized_areas: machine learning, deep learning, nlp, computer vision, penetration testing automation, ai agents, neural networks, gpt-like models, emotion detection, license plate detection
skills.development_tools: docker, git, jupyter notebooks, google colab, flutter (mobile development), web development
skills.cloud_infrastructure: pythonanywhere, various cloud platforms, containerization and deployment
skills.current_focus: ai agents, automated penetration testing, language models, computer vision applications, intelligent automation systems

research.current_focus: ai-powered penetration testing and cybersecurity, intelligent agent systems and automation, small language models and text generation, computer vision for real-world applications
research.active_projects: pentest_agents - modular ai system for automated penetration testing, small-language-model - training gpt-like models for text generation, sql-agents - natural language to sql database interaction, agentic - agent system implementations
research.interests: artificial intelligence in cybersecurity, autonomous agent systems, neural network architectures, real-time ai applications, ai safety and ethical considerations
research.application_domains: cybersecurity and penetration testing, computer vision and object detection, natural language processing, mobile app development with ai integration

quotes_list: the question of whether a computer can think is no more interesting than the question of whether a submarine can swim. - edsger dijkstra
artificial intelligence is the new electricity. - andrew ng
in the world of cybersecurity, the only constant is change, and the only certainty is uncertainty. - cybersecurity wisdom
the best way to predict the future is to create it. - peter drucker
any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. - arthur c. clarke
the real question is not whether machines think but whether men do. - b.f. skinner
security is not a product, but a process. - bruce schneier
quotes.personal_philosophy: ai should enhance human capabilities while maintaining ethical boundaries. in cybersecurity, we build defenses by thinking like attackers. innovation comes from the intersection of curiosity and practical application.
